added.description: Specify the CPU count the VM should use and report as active
added.name: ActiveProcessorCount

added.description: Optimize heap options for long-running memory intensive apps
added.name: AggressiveHeap

added.description: Path to the directoy where a temporary file will be created to use as the backing store for Java Heap.
added.name: AllocateHeapAt

added.description: Calculate class fingerprint
added.name: CalculateClassFingerprint

added.description: Disable the use of stack guard pages if the JVM is loaded on the primordial process thread
added.name: DisablePrimordialThreadGuardPages

added.description: Dynamically resize system dictionaries as needed
added.name: DynamicallyResizeSystemDictionaries

added.description: Enable Thread SMR extra validity checks
added.name: EnableThreadSMRExtraValidityChecks

added.description: Enable Thread SMR Statistics
added.name: EnableThreadSMRStatistics

added.description: If nonzero set a timeout in milliseconds for handshakes
added.name: HandshakeTimeout

added.description: Percentage of real memory used for initial heap size
added.name: InitialRAMPercentage

added.description: Number of iterations in strip mined loop
added.name: LoopStripMiningIter

added.description: Loop with fewer iterations are not strip mined
added.name: LoopStripMiningIterShortLoop

added.description: Maximum percentage of real memory used for maximum heap size
added.name: MaxRAMPercentage

added.description: Minimum percentage of real memory used for maximum heapsize on systems with small physical memory size
added.name: MinRAMPercentage

added.description: Percentage of used monitors before triggering cleanup safepoint which deflates monitors (0 is off). The check is performed on GuaranteedSafepointInterval.
added.name: MonitorUsedDeflationThreshold

added.description: Data to add to the CDS archive file
added.name: SharedArchiveConfigFile

added.description: Use prfm hint with specified distance in compiled code.Value -1 means off.
added.name: SoftwarePrefetchHintDistance

added.description: Use Power8 VSX instructions for superword optimization.
added.name: SuperwordUseVSX

added.description: If true, simulates an unresponsive error handler.
added.name: TestUnresponsiveErrorHandler

added.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK13
Obsoleted in JDK14
Expired in JDK15
added.name: ThreadLocalHandshakes

added.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK11
Expired in JDK12
added.description: Enable Application Class Data Sharing when using shared spaces
added.name: UseAppCDS

added.description: Enable detection and runtime container configuration support
added.name: UseContainerSupport

added.description: Use multi-precision multiply instruction (mpmul) on SPARC
added.name: UseMPMUL

added.description: Use Subword Analysis to set maximum vector size
added.name: UseSubwordForMaxVector

added.description: Use Vectorized Cmov
added.name: UseVectorCmov

added.defaultValue: GC type(s) to verify when Verify*GC is enabled.Available types are collector specific.
added.name: VerifyGCType

removed.description: Automatic GC selection pause threshold in milliseconds
removed.name: AutoGCSelectPauseMillis

removed.description: (Unsafe, Unstable)
removed.name: ClearFPUAtPark

removed.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK9
Obsoleted in JDK10
Expired in JDK11
removed.description: Convert sleep(0) to thread yield
removed.name: ConvertSleepToYield

removed.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK9
Obsoleted in JDK10
Expired in JDK11
removed.description: Convert yield to a sleep of MinSleepInterval to simulate Win32 behavior
removed.name: ConvertYieldToSleep

removed.description: A System.gc() request invokes a concurrent collection and also unloads classes during such a concurrent gc cycle (effective only when UseConcMarkSweepGC)
removed.name: ExplicitGCInvokesConcurrentAndUnloadsClasses

removed.description: Forces flushing of log buffers before verification.
removed.name: G1HRRSFlushLogBuffersOnVerify

removed.description: Overhead of concurrent marking
removed.name: G1MarkingOverheadPercent

removed.description: Load polling page address from thread object (required for per-thread safepoints on platforms != IA64)
removed.name: LoadPollAddressFromThread

removed.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK9
Obsoleted in JDK10
Expired in JDK11
removed.description: Minimum sleep() interval (milliseconds) when ConvertSleepToYield is off (used for Solaris)
removed.name: MinSleepInterval

removed.description: Trace creation of Performance Data Entries
removed.name: PerfTraceDataCreation

removed.description: Trace PerfMemory create/attach/detach calls
removed.name: PerfTraceMemOps

removed.description: Experimental: Tune loaded class cache starting size
removed.name: PredictedLoadedClassCount

removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK16
Expired in JDK17
removed.description: Print usage of shared spaces

removed.description: Size of the shared miscellaneous code area (in bytes)
removed.name: SharedMiscCodeSize

removed.description: Size of the shared miscellaneous data area (in bytes)
removed.name: SharedMiscDataSize

removed.description: Size of read-only space for metadata (in bytes)
removed.name: SharedReadOnlySize

removed.description: Size of read-write space for metadata (in bytes)
removed.name: SharedReadWriteSize

removed.description: Maximum bytecode size of methods to inline when using Shark
removed.name: SharkMaxInlineSize

removed.name: SharkOptimizationLevel

removed.name: SharkPrintBitcodeOf

removed.name: SharkPrintTypeflowOf

removed.description: Trace bytecode compilation

removed.name: SharkTraceInstalls

removed.name: SharkVerifyFunction

removed.description: Trace accumulated time for old collection

removed.description: Show OopMapGeneration
removed.name: TraceOopMapGeneration

removed.description: Trace accumulated time for young collection
removed.name: TraceYoungGenTime

removed.description: Use automatic collection selection policy
removed.name: UseAutoGCSelectPolicy

removed.description: Use parallel threads in the new generation
removed.name: UseParNewGC

removed.description: Use an index to speed random access to relocations
